bibl.title: Two Psalm-Fragments in the Duke Papyrus Collection.
bibl.note: 1. P. Duke Inv. 661 verso. LXX, Psalm 50.17-20. Provenance unknown, seventh/eighth century. - 2. P. Duke Inv. 740. LXX, Psalm 88.4-8, 15-18. Provenance unknown, fourth century.
bibl.seg: GONIS Nikolaos, Two Psalm-Fragments in the Duke Papyrus Collection.
ArchPF 46 (2000) pp. 14-18 et pll. I; - III.
1. P. Duke Inv. 661 verso. LXX, Psalm 50.17-20. Provenance unknown, seventh/eighth century. - 2. P. Duke Inv. 740. LXX, Psalm 88.4-8, 15-18. Provenance unknown, fourth century.
